clipboard: At CloudDefense.AI, I worked on the AI Buddies System, a cross-platform prototype designed to monitor user activity and intelligently classify tasks like coding, reading, or writing. I built the data acquisition module that captures screen content via OCR, clipboard data, and active window titles, and integrated it with a language model that interprets this context to infer the user’s activity in real time.
